00100     virtual ~QTextCharFormat();
00101

00103                      QTextCustomItem* item = 0) const;
00104 
00105     QColor color() const;
00106     QFont font() const;
00107     QString anchorHref() const;
00108     QString anchorName() const;
00109     bool useLinkColor() const { return linkColor; }
00110     
00111     bool isAnchor() const;
00112 
00113     QTextCharFormat formatWithoutCustom();
00114 
00115     QTextCustomItem *customItem() const;
00116 
00117 private:
00118     QFont font_;

00166 class QTextCustomItem : public QShared
00167 {
00168 public:
00169     QTextCustomItem()
00170     : xpos(0), ypos(0), width(-1), height(0)
00171     {}
00172     virtual ~QTextCustomItem() {}
00173     virtual void draw(QPainter* p, int x, int y,
00174               int ox, int oy, int cx, int cy, int cw, int ch,
00175               QRegion& backgroundRegion, const QColorGroup& cg,
00176               const QTextOptions& to ) = 0;
00177 
00178     virtual void realize( QPainter* ) { width = 0; }
00179 
00180     enum Placement { PlaceInline = 0, PlaceLeft, PlaceRight };
00181     virtual Placement placement() const { return PlaceInline; }
00182     bool placeInline() { return placement() == PlaceInline; }
00183 
00184     virtual bool breakLine() const { return ownLine(); }
00185     enum Clear { ClearNone, ClearLeft, ClearRight, ClearBoth }; //  move to QStyleSheetItem?
00186     virtual Clear clearBehind() const { return ClearNone; }
00187 
00188     virtual bool noErase() const { return FALSE; };
00189     virtual bool expandsHorizontally() const { return FALSE; }
00190     virtual bool ownLine() const { return expandsHorizontally(); };
00191     virtual void resize( QPainter*, int nwidth ){ width = nwidth; };
00192 
00193     virtual bool isTable() const { return FALSE; }
00194 
00195     int xpos; // used for floating items
00196     int ypos; // used for floating items
00197     int width;
00198     int height;
00199 };

00281 class QTextParagraph
00282 {
00283 public:
00284     QTextParagraph( QTextParagraph* p, QTextFormatCollection* formatCol, const QTextCharFormat& fmt,
00285        const QStyleSheetItem *stl, const QMap<QString, QString> &attr );
00286 
00287     QTextParagraph( QTextParagraph* p, QTextFormatCollection* formatCol, const QTextCharFormat& fmt,
00288        const QStyleSheetItem *stl );
00289 
00290     ~QTextParagraph();
00291 
00292     QTextParagraph* parent;
00293     QTextFormatCollection* formats;
00294     QTextCharFormat format;
00295     QTextRichString text;
00296     const QStyleSheetItem* style;
00297     QMap<QString, QString> attributes_;
00298     QTextParagraph* child;
00299     QTextParagraph* prev;
00300     QTextParagraph* next;
00301 
00302     QTextParagraph* nextInDocument() const;
00303     QTextParagraph* prevInDocument() const;
00304 
00305     QTextParagraph* lastChild() const;
00306 
00307     inline QMap<QString, QString> attributes()  const
00308     {
00309     return attributes_;
00310     }
00311 
00312     int ypos;
00313     int height;
00314     bool dirty;
00315     bool selected;
00316     int id;
00317 
00318     QTextCustomItem::Clear clear;
00319 
00320     QTextFlow* flow() const;
00321 
00322     inline int margin(QStyleSheetItem::Margin m) const
00323     {
00324     if (style->margin(m) != QStyleSheetItem::Undefined)
00325         return style->margin(m);
00326     return 0;
00327     }
00328 
00329     inline int topMargin() const
00330     {
00331     int m = margin( QStyleSheetItem::MarginTop );
00332     if ( !prev && parent )
00333         m += parent->topMargin();
00334     return m;
00335     }
00336 
00337     inline int bottomMargin() const
00338     {
00339     int m = margin( QStyleSheetItem::MarginBottom );
00340     if ( !next && parent )
00341         m += parent->bottomMargin();
00342     return m;
00343     }
00344 
00345     int labelMargin() const;
00346 
00347     inline int totalMargin(QStyleSheetItem::Margin m) const
00348     {
00349     int tm = parent? parent->totalMargin( m ) : 0;
00350     if (style->margin(m) != QStyleSheetItem::Undefined)
00351         tm += style->margin(m);
00352     return tm;
00353     }
00354 
00355     inline int totalLabelMargin() const
00356     {
00357     int tlm = parent? parent->totalLabelMargin() : 0;
00358     tlm += labelMargin();
00359     return tlm;
00360     }
00361 
00362     int numberOfSubParagraph( QTextParagraph* subparagraph, bool onlyListItems);
00363     QStyleSheetItem::ListStyle listStyle();
00364     inline int alignment() const
00365     {
00366     if ( align != QStyleSheetItem::Undefined )
00367         return align;
00368     if ( style->alignment() != QStyleSheetItem::Undefined )
00369         return style->alignment();
00370     return parent?parent->alignment():QStyleSheetItem::AlignLeft;
00371     }
00372 
00373     void invalidateLayout();
00374 
00375 private:
00376     void init();
00377     int align;
00378 
00379 protected:
00380     QTextFlow* flow_;
00381 };

00662 inline QColor QTextCharFormat::color() const
00663 {
00664     return color_;
00665 }
00666 
00667 inline QFont QTextCharFormat::font() const
00668 {
00669     return font_;
00670 }
00671 
00672 inline QString QTextCharFormat::anchorHref() const
00673 {
00674     return anchor_href;
00675 }
00676 
00677 inline QString QTextCharFormat::anchorName() const
00678 {
00679     return anchor_name;
00680 }
00681 
00682 inline QTextCustomItem * QTextCharFormat::customItem() const
00683 {
00684     return custom;
00685 }
00686 
00687 inline bool QTextCharFormat::isAnchor() const
00688 {
00689     return !anchor_href.isEmpty()  || !anchor_href.isEmpty();
00690 }
00691 
00692 inline int QTextRichString::length() const
00693 {
00694     return len;
00695 }
00696 
00697 inline void QTextRichString::append( const QString& c,const  QTextCharFormat& fmt )
00698 {
00699     insert( length(), c, fmt);
00700 }
00701 
00702 inline bool QTextRichString::isEmpty() const
00703 {
00704     return len == 0;
00705 }
00706 
00707 inline QString QTextRichString::charAt( int index ) const
00708 {
00709     return items[index].c;
00710 }
00711 
00712 inline QTextCharFormat *QTextRichString::formatAt( int index ) const
00713 {
00714     return items[index].format;
00715 }
00716 
00717 inline QTextCustomItem* QTextRichString::customItemAt( int index ) const
00718 {
00719     return items[index].format->customItem();
00720 }
00721 
00722 inline bool QTextRichString::isCustomItem( int index ) const
00723 {
00724     return customItemAt( index ) != 0;
00725 }
00726 
00727 inline bool QTextRichString::haveSameFormat( int index1, int index2 ) const
00728 {
00729     return items[index1].format == items[index2].format;
00730 }
00731 
00732 inline QTextCharFormat* QRichTextFormatter::format() const
00733 {
00734     return paragraph->text.formatAt( current );
00735 }
00736 
00737 #endif // QT_FEATURE_RICHTEXT
00738 
00739 #endif // QRICHTEXT_P_H
